Text: I've written a script that slices a mass of text into 1000 character blocks and groups them in an object. Now what I'm trying to do is take all the text that is put in the textarea #PATypes, slice it up into 1000 character blocks, then put each individual block into a cell in a table. Unfortunately, I'm running into trouble- does anyone have an idea what I am doing wrong? I've written the relevant snippets down below; if you'd like to see the whole thing, check here: http://jsfiddle.net/ayoformayo/yTcRb/1/ HTML
